mapper.select: select id, name, signUpBeginTime, signUpEndTime, email, smtpPassword, contestBeginTime, contestEndTime, isDownload, isQuery from contest limit #{offset}, #{count}
mapper.insert: insert into contest (name, signUpBeginTime, signUpEndTime, email, smtpPassword, contestBeginTime, contestEndTime, createTime) VALUES (#{name}, #{signUpBeginTime}, #{signUpEndTime}, #{email}, #{smtpPassword}, #{contestBeginTime}, #{contestEndTime}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: update contest set name = #{name}, signUpBeginTime = #{signUpBeginTime}, signUpEndTime = #{signUpEndTime}, email = #{email}, smtpPassword = #{smtpPassword}, contestBeginTime = #{contestBeginTime}, contestEndTime = #{contestEndTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name from contest where name like concat('%', #{query}, '%') order by id desc
select id, name, createTime from contest limit #{offset}, #{count}
